imdb.title: Vatican kiseki chousakan
imdb.plot: Two priests charged with traveling the world to validate "miracles" find themselves tangled in events filled with deceit. As members of the Assembly of Saints, Robert Nicholas and Kou Hiraga seek the truth behind the supposed work...

episodes.title: Through God's Succor, My Eyes Are Opened
episodes.plot: A claim of a miracle take Hiraga and Roberto to America where they must solve the mystery behind a virgin conception but something else lies in wait.

episodes.title: The Endless Unease of Existence
episodes.plot: The mystery continues for Hiraga and Roberto as the bodies continue to pile up. Will they find the answers they are looking for?

episodes.title: Secrets of the Gods and the Beast of 666
episodes.plot: The investigation leads Roberto and Hiraga into the principal's office. As the mystery unfolds, have they found a true case of demonic possession?

episodes.title: Even So, I Still Believe in the Lord God
episodes.plot: Hiraga and Roberto get to the depths of the mystery, but will what they find shake their faith?

episodes.title: The Game of Angels and Demons
episodes.plot: The backstory between Hiraga and Lauren's relationship comes to light as they talk about past cases.

episodes.title: God Bestows Upon Us All His Revelations
episodes.plot: An investigation of into whether a man by the name, John Jordan, should be a saint leads the examiners to a remote village. The question lingers, was he a prophet or not?

episodes.title: Those Branded with a Curse
episodes.plot: The dead man's prophecy weighs heavily on Roberto. As Roberto finds himself delving into rituals he finds within "cursed books", Hiraga worries about his partner's condition.

episodes.title: Only Through Death Can We Fully Comprehend Rebirth into Eternal Life
episodes.plot: Roberto confronts Kid Goldman about his claim that John Jordan was a prophet. Will Roberto successfully dispute his claim?

episodes.title: The Decapitating Clown and the Tale of Solomon
episodes.plot: Roberto and Hiraga head to the village of Monte to investigate the mystery surrounding the legend of the Decapitating Clown.

episodes.title: The Ghosts of the Past Appeared
episodes.plot: Roberto and Hiraga continue their investigation into the legend of the Decapitating Clown, yet things just keep getting odder. Will they be able to crack this case?

episodes.title: The Gold of the Darkness; I am with the Lord
episodes.plot: The investigation takes Hiraga and Roberto deep into the Forest of the Decapitating Clown as they trace the steps of Carlo's video. In the darkness, does Hell truly await?

episodes.title: Sinfonia
episodes.plot: Ryota's condition has taken a sudden turn for the worse. Will he need a miracle to make it through alive?
